[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_row add_extended=”true” values=”%5B%7B%22extended_animation%22%3A%22particles%22%2C%22figure_color%22%3A%22%23ffffff%22%2C%22drop_colors%22%3A%22random_colors%22%2C%22part_color%22%3A%22%23ff7e00%22%2C%22part_color_1%22%3A%22%23ff7e00%22%2C%22part_color_2%22%3A%22%233224e9%22%2C%22part_color_3%22%3A%22%2369e9f2%22%2C%22extended_animation_pos_vertical%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22extended_animation_pos_horizont%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22sphere_width%22%3A%22100%22%2C%22particles_number%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22particles_size%22%3A%2210%22%2C%22particles_speed%22%3A%222%22%2C%22hover_anim%22%3A%22grab%22%2C%22parallax_dir%22%3A%22vertical%22%2C%22parallax_factor%22%3A%220.3%22%2C%22particles_position_top%22%3A%220%22%2C%22particles_position_left%22%3A%220%22%2C%22particles_width%22%3A%22100%22%2C%22particles_height%22%3A%22100%22%7D%5D”][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”bounceIn”]

Aarvy Technology’s custom software development is inclusive of a wide array of solutions. Over the years we have rendered a whole spectrum of
bespoke software development solutions to variegated industries across the orb.

Our team of experienced and innovative software developers ensure accelerated and yet efficient software products suited for your unique business objectives.
With best practices and execution methods in place backed by a state of the art infrastructure, we guarantee seamless deliveries.

 [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1612502421531{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”2441″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css_animation=”fadeInDown”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1612502387976{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_row add_extended=”true” values=”%5B%7B%22extended_animation%22%3A%22particles%22%2C%22figure_color%22%3A%22%23ffffff%22%2C%22drop_colors%22%3A%22random_colors%22%2C%22part_color%22%3A%22%23ff7e00%22%2C%22part_color_1%22%3A%22%23ff7e00%22%2C%22part_color_2%22%3A%22%233224e9%22%2C%22part_color_3%22%3A%22%2369e9f2%22%2C%22extended_animation_pos_vertical%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22extended_animation_pos_horizont%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22sphere_width%22%3A%22100%22%2C%22particles_number%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22particles_size%22%3A%2210%22%2C%22particles_speed%22%3A%222%22%2C%22hover_anim%22%3A%22grab%22%2C%22parallax_dir%22%3A%22vertical%22%2C%22parallax_factor%22%3A%220.3%22%2C%22particles_position_top%22%3A%220%22%2C%22particles_position_left%22%3A%220%22%2C%22particles_width%22%3A%22100%22%2C%22particles_height%22%3A%22100%22%7D%5D”][vc_column width=”1/2″][wgl_double_headings css_animation=”fadeIn” title_color=”#252525″ subtitle_color=”#ff7d00″ title=”We Specialize in RIA
(Rich Internet Applications)”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]We are one of the early adopters of RIA and as an all-round alternative and productivity quotient, Whether it’s about leveraging javascript or plugins based technologies or Silverlight which is .NET framework’s most sought after plugin, our extensive experience in custom software development will never let you run short of standardized features and functionality.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

Hire Aarvy Technology For:

  • Custom Application Development
  • System Integration
  • Infrastructure support
  • Software Security Solutions
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInRight”]
  • QA & Testing
  • Product lifecycle management
  • Migration & Upgrades
  • Deployment & Implementation
  • Maintenance & Support
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”2439″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
